summary:
Add Ingredients in a Jar . You can find those jar at Arcadia\'s Cauldron (Whiterun-Alchemy Shop)
Its located the bag that was leaning against the wall, please see screenshot.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------
Ingredients in a Jar Playable
                                    by Blary
--------------------------------

28 Clutter Ingredients in a Jar


You can find those jar at Arcadia\'s Cauldron (Whiterun-Alchemy Shop)
Its located the bag that was leaning against the wall, please see screenshot.

*I made those mesh for house decoration. So there is not \'All\' Ingredients.

The meshes/textures can be used as modder\'s resource for Skyrim mods.
Please feel free to use in your own mod, as long as proper credit is given.
author: Blary
